EmailTemplate.name: Weekly Update 23rd May, 2013
EmailTemplate.subject: Weekly Update 23rd May, 2013
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Tottenham Hotspur Football Camp
Due to the popularity of the year 1-3 coaching sessions, we have decided to add another 6 places. If you would like your child to take part then please register them using the link below.
There are also 4 places still available for the years 4-9 sessions. If you would like your child to take part in this fabulous opportunity, then please register them using the link below.
http://www.eventbrite.com/event/6208607111
If you require any further information, then please get in touch with me at adam.hoult@internationalschool.ru.
Kindest regards,
Mr Adam Hoult
Teacher of Physical Education The International School of Moscow World Class Education
__________________________________________________________ Member of The British School Group- University of Cambridge Examination Centre - Affiliate Member of the Conference of British International Schools - Licensed by the Russian Ministry of Education
